TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RootNamespaceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class RootNamespaceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class RootNamespaceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Representa um atributo de nível de assembly que é usado para identificar o valor da propriedade em um arquivo de projeto do Visual Studio.

span.span: Represents an assembly level attribute that is used to identify the value of the property in a Visual Studio project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse atributo é principalmente relevante para resoluções de tipo de classes parciais por compiladores de marcação.This attribute is mainly relevant for type resolutions of partial classes by markup compilers. Nas versões anteriores do .NET Framework, essa classe existia no assembly específicos de WPF WindowsBase.In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. Em [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], está no assembly System. XAML.In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. Para obter mais informações, consulte [tipos migrados do WPF para System. XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

summary.span: Obtém a cadeia de caracteres que corresponde ao valor da propriedade em um arquivo de projeto de [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/includes/vs-current-short-md.md)].

span.span: Gets the string that corresponds to the value of the property in a [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/includes/vs-current-short-md.md)] project file.

value.span: A cadeia de caracteres que corresponde ao valor da propriedade em um [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/includes/vs-current-short-md.md)] arquivo de projeto.

span.span: The string that corresponds to the value of the property in a [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/includes/vs-current-short-md.md)] project file.
